name: 1D (Decodoku)
description:
A 1D dungeon crawler, made by James Wootton and family for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. Head down into the dungeon, fight monsters and get treasure.

  • Play online here.
  • Click Run near the top left of the screen to start the game.

Not only is there only one dimension, there is also only one line of tutorial.

  • Controls are ← and → to move and z to attack.

You'll have to figure out yourself where you need to be moving to, and how to attack without taking damage.

If the controls don't seem to work, click on the game image.
Made for the PewPew handheld game console, but the link above let's you play it on an emulator. The game also makes use of quantum computing using Qiskit.
